description: Light, comfortable shorts for everyday use, weekends and travelling in warm climates. Well-fitting cut with inside drawcord adjustment in the waist plus a zippered pocket for keys and other essentials you don’t want to risk losing. Made from quick-drying stretch fabric in recycled polyamide, they are always ready to follow you out hiking, biking or on activities on or close to water.
name: Fjallraven High Coast Lite Shorts - Mens
